Name: Battle Imagine - Shadow Commander
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Shadow Dominion Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Heavy Slash.

Stunt! Heavy Slash
Summon Elite: Shadow Commander to perform a flurry of slashes forward, dealing Attack Damage and consuming all Heavy Slash charges to greatly improve the current DMG dealt.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Shadow Dominion Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Heavy Slash.

Stunt! Heavy Slash
Summon Elite: Shadow Commander to perform a flurry of slashes forward, dealing Attack Damage and consuming all Heavy Slash charges to greatly improve the current DMG dealt.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
